message: RT @mattchenderson: After that awesome demo by @theyavor, you're probably ready to start with AAD and @AzureMobile .NET. Here's how http://t.co/Kpo9qy0Duu
name: Windows Azure: Microsoft's Cloud Platform | Cloud Hosting | Cloud Services
caption: www.windowsazure.com
description: Windows Azure is an open and flexible cloud platform that enables you to quickly build, deploy and manage applications across a global network of Microsoft-managed data center
